attributes.action: G4S to compensate everyone for failing to uphold their contract to supply Security Personel for the London Olympics & Paralympic Games of 2012
attributes.additional_details:
G4S should compensate anyone involved for their failure in organising themselves and upholding their contract during the London Olympic and Paralympic games of 2012,
They should compensate their staff, (including those they have failed to deliver full training and deployment to) for their time spent chasing after G4S to sort their own deployment, and for their earnings lost.
As well as for the Police and Armed Services who had to step in at the last minute to cover the shortfall in security personnel.

G4S should also publicly and personally acknowledge their failings and the treatment of staff, including returning of all personal documents and to destroy any other sensitive information which may potentially be misplaced, as well as thanking every armed serviceman, servicewoman and police officer for standing in at short notice.
